title: How to Log Out on Facebook Messenger on a PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to https://www.messenger.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.messenger.com in a web browser.

steps.title: Click the gear icon.
steps.content: Click the gear icon. Itâ€™s at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Click Log Out.
steps.content: Click Log Out . You are no longer signed in to Facebook Messenger. This action will only log you out from Facebook Messenger, not regular Facebook (accessible via Facebook.com). To sign back in, enter your Facebook login information or click Continue as <your name> .
